Hello! We are the IT Project Crew, <Giggal People>.

Our team is made to conduct projects and to study by using
technology stacks used by actual early startup companies (service companies) and company employers requires.

We assume that a reason for doing a side project is probably to get a job, change jobs, or for your own good.
Rather than a side project that simply develops a function,
you can experience and study the parts that the company actually worries about and the information security part.
Meetings are held every first Saturday of the Month, starting offline, online bi-weekly, and it is held in Seoul.
You must be able to attend both online/offline meetings.

ğŸš€ We want this kind of people!
First, those who like to meet people and are not conservative!
Second, those who can do their best to achieve their goals
Third, those who can ask questions about things they donâ€™t know and find good answers to solve problems!
Fourth, those who like to organize what they have studied and share it with the crew!

Recruiting part

1. PM (Project Manager): Project management, service planning and marketing management, meeting and personnel management.
2. Service planning: requirements analysis/design, UML and flow chart, API design, database design (ERD), policy definition, QA test, I.A, story board, etc.
3. Designer: Web / App design, UI / UX, web publishing, etc.
4. FE: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, React.js, Next.js, ReactNative, TypeScript
5. BE: Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot (JPA, Querydsl, MyBatis), Node.js, Nest.js (Type ORM), TypeScript
6. Infrastructure: Linux, (Ubuntu), Docker, K8s, CI/CD (Jenkins, etc.)
7. AI (Artificial Intelligence): Python (Numpy, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scipy, Keras, Theano), Java, Kotlin
8. Mobile: IOS (Swift), AOS (Java, Kotlin)
9. White Hack: Python, Java, C, Kali Linux

Our meeting is focused on learning skills while working on a project using the technology stacks that are actually used in the industry as much as possible.
That's why you can learn from the contents below!
Front-end developer, Mobile Developer: how to write test code, static code analysis tool and code review twice a week with the crew, how to use infrastructure through CI/CD construction, etc.
Back-end developer: how to write test code, static code analysis tool and code review twice a week with the crew, how to use infrastructure through CI/CD construction, how to use JPA, QueryDsl, MyBatis, etc.
Planning: How to write documents required for various types of planning (requirements analysis, definition, UML, DB design method, basic development grammar using JavaScript, QA test method, planning method through communication with field developers, etc.
Designer: Design method through communication with developers, design system construction method, responsive design, etc.
AI (Artificial Intelligence): AI development through collaboration with web developers, AI OCR, AI Image, AI Chat Bot, etc.
White Hack: Actual web and app service mock hacking (Black Box) and vulnerability analysis, etc.

Our meeting is highly recommended to these people!

1. Those who are considering moving from SI, SM, and solution companies to service companies, but do not know what to prepare for.
2. Those who are a job seeker but do not know what to study.
3. Those who have passion and enthusiasm and want to develop their vision, but don't know what to do.
4. Those who want to study while communicating with practitioners

Number of open positions :
We are not looking for someone with all of the skill stacks listed above. If you have basic knowledge, you can join us while studying!
In other words, our meeting can learn a lot, only if there is passion and enthusiasm! There is no limit on the number of recruits,
and we want to work with people who are responsible to the end the project and have passion for their work! We already have project themes we want to create!
Our topics will be explained during the joining process (interview).

You can check out for more details through the notion link below!

Recruitment Notice: https://productive-ornament-cad.notion.site/Crew-Recruitment-Notice-Global-d0e47ddb4d71462b8297f88033986f03?pvs=4
Google Forms application: https://forms.gle/zKK53fbRWKDmXqhE9
We hope to see you soon!!
